Description:
This voluptuous, ultra "melt-in" mask envelops the hair and instantly saturates the hair fiber without weighing it down.
Its unique texture is a perfect balance between generosity and lightness.
ReviewText: I love this Phytokeratine Extreme Exceptional Mask! It is a bit pricey but I use it only once a week, so lasts pretty long. The mask made my, colour treated damaged hair feel soft and healthier after the first use. I love this product! If your hair needs rescuing I recommend you try this Phytokeratine Extreme Exceptional Mask.
Title: Made my damaged hair look Great!

Description:
This voluptuous, ultra "melt-in" mask envelops the hair and instantly saturates the hair fiber without weighing it down.
Its unique texture is a perfect balance between generosity and lightness.
ReviewText: I recently purchased this hair treatment after using a product from the same line, phytokeratine extreme.  The mask has a nice consistency for easy application. It does leave my hair extra conditioned, however,  I do not care for the smell of it.   It's not bad,  Just not the scent I would have liked
Title: Beneficial ingredients
